titles.title: A bill to provide assistance to rebuild hospitals damaged by Hurricane Katrina or Hurricane Rita, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide assistance to rebuild hospitals damaged by Hurricane Katrina or Hurricane Rita, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award emergency grants to Louisiana hospitals to assist in the recovery from Hurricane Katrina. Provides that certain amounts made available to the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) for emergency preparedness and response under the Second Emergency Supplemental Appropriations Act to Meet Immediate Needs Arising From the Consequences of Hurricane Katrina, 2005 shall be available for such emergency grants and earmarks specified amounts for the Oshner Clinical Foundation in Louisiana, the East Jefferson General Hospital, and the West Jefferson Medical Center.
